channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It’s Time to Ditch ‘Disparate Impact Theory’ — and Biden’s Weaponization of Civil Rights Law
item.description: HUD has proposed a rule to end the agency’s use of this pernicious legal doctrine.

item.title: Pro-Lifers Still Need to Be Heard in Washington
item.description: The mixed record of the second Trump administration and the GOP Congress on life suggests that pro-lifers still have work to do in Washington.

item.title: Let the Pro-Life Movement Declare Independence
item.description: The Republican Party’s leadership has made its choice. Pro-lifers need to make theirs.

item.title: Education Remains the Key to Good Citizenship
item.description: No matter whether you’re an immigrant or a native-born American, education instills the love of country that we all ought to have.

item.title: DOJ vows to press charges after activists disrupt church where Minnesota ICE official is a pastor
item.description: The U.S. Department of Justice said Sunday it is investigating a group of protesters in Minnesota who disrupted services at a church where a local off...

item.title: Walz, Frey pan DOJ subpoenas as Pentagon reportedly prepared to deploy 1,500 troops to Minnesota
item.description: The Justice Department has issued subpoenas for Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz and Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey in what appears to be an expanding investigat...

item.title: British leader tells Trump that tariffs on Europe over Greenland are 'wrong'
item.description: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer told President Trump on Sunday that it is "wrong" to impose tariffs on European nations that refuse to back his pu...

item.title: It’s Way Past Time to Retire the International Space Station
item.description: With sky-high costs for minimal returns, the ISS has failed on both the geopolitical and scientific research fronts.

item.title: Sending soldiers to Minneapolis for immigration crackdown would be unconstitutional, mayor says
item.description: The mayor of Minneapolis said Sunday that sending active duty soldiers into Minnesota to help with an immigration crackdown is a ridiculous and uncons...

item.title: Senators request fraud probe of Minneapolis charity favored by Ilhan Omar
item.description: Republican senators have asked the Justice Department to investigate a Minneapolis-based charity that nearly landed $1 million in taxpayer money court...

item.title: The Left Will Never Forgive Renee Good (Or Anyone Else) For Being White
item.description: Leftism is the only ideology that demands total subjugation and will still treat you like garbage after you die for it.

item.title: Parents Must Actively Opt Out Of Turning Their Kids Into Digital Age Zombies
item.description: The highest civic skill in the digital age is not coding or content creation, but the ability to look away.

item.title: Leftists Play-Acting At Revolution Are Mad The Cops Won’t Play Along
item.description: Word people perform words at doing-things people, while the doing-things people keep doing things, disregarding the words.

item.title: Country Singer Jeffrey Steele’s New Song Gives ‘A Voice’ To The Forgotten American
item.description: 'I hope this song becomes a voice not only for people speaking up for others and themselves, but for these young kids and these young artists,' Steele...

item.title: Exclusive: Child Abusers Top ICE’s Latest List Of ‘Worst Of The Worst’ Illegal Aliens
item.description: 'These are the type of sickos we are getting OUT of our neighborhoods,' said DHS's Tricia McLaughlin in a statement to The Federalist.
